message: I liked the anime "Rin: Daughters of Mnemosyne" (be warned that it has very violent parts) which has a lot of sexy big-eyed, long-legged, thigh-length hair art (if you don't like cartoon softporn you won't like Rin) and a cohesive and mostly intelligent sci-fi plot. I didn't like the movie Leo suggested, "Salt", as it's just your standard post cold war thriller with bad actions scenes with really bad background music.
If you like netflix you might want to join this group: https://convore.com/netflix/
